summary: App deployed to production (Version 35); requested UI cleanup to remove outdated “Draft 34” text from the footer.
known_issues: Footer displays outdated static text “Draft 34” even after publishing Version 35 (user requested removal)

existing_features.title: Remove only the footer text that displays “Draft 34” (the live version label) while keeping the rest of the footer content and layout unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove only the “Draft 34” text line from the footer while keeping the rest unchanged
